charges.charge_description: AIDING AND ASSISTING IN THE PREPARATION OF A FALSE INCOME TAX RETURN 26:7206(2)(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 12 mos and 1 day on Single-Count Indictment. 1 year Supervised Release on the single-count information, under the usual terms and conditions of the U.S. Probation Office. Special assessment of $100. All fines waived. Restitution of $26,708.

charges.charge_description: 26:7206(1) MAKING AND SUBSCRIBING TO A FALSE INCOME TAX RETURN(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Government's motion, all remaining count(s)/underlying indictment, ordered dismissed.
